One week left to Solarize Lexington-Bedford.
Solarize Lexington-Bedford ends June 30. Don’t miss out!
Solarize Lexington-Bedford is on the home stretch!
There is only one week left for Solarize Lexington-Bedford! Move quickly to get your contract signed. Thanks to the hard work of local volunteers, Solarize Lexington-Bedford has reached Tier 5 pricing, the lowest available. Everyone who participates in Solarize Lexington-Bedford is able to take advantage of the lowest pricing possible through the program, in addition to state and local incentives. Now is the best time to go solar. But hurry! After June 30, the state rebate will drop and the special pricing available with Solarize Lexington-Bedford will be gone.
Don’t miss the deadline! Contact your solar consultant today to discuss your system and how you can go solar solar with Solarize Lexington-Bedford and start producing your own electricity for less than what you are currently paying your utility company.
Contact your Solar Consultant today! <http://go.astrumsolar.com/solarizelexingtonbedford>
Questions? Contact your solar coaches: Marcia Gens (solarizelexington@gmail.com <mailto:solarizelexington@gmail.com>) or Dave Enos (solarizebedford@gmail.com <mailto:solarizebedford@gmail.com>).
Program Ends June 30
See a Sunny Day in a Whole New Way Call us: 800-903-6130
